question: Find the greatest and the smallest numbers in the following set: [2365, 782, 45098, 9213, 105]
hints: Compare the number of digits in each number.
A number with more digits is greater than one with fewer digits.
If two numbers have the same number of digits, compare digit by digit from left to right.
The number with the smallest left-most digit is the smallest.

question: Find the greatest and the smallest numbers in the following set: [1457, 82345, 1002, 5478, 321]
hints: First, check the number of digits in each number.
A five-digit number is greater than any four-digit number.
Among four-digit numbers, compare the left-most digits.
The number with the smallest left-most digit is the smallest.

question: Arrange the following numbers in ascending order: [7634, 982, 34678, 1245, 572]
hints: Start by grouping numbers based on the number of digits.
A three-digit number is smaller than any four-digit number.
Compare the left-most digits of numbers with the same number of digits.
Arrange numbers from the smallest to the largest based on these comparisons.

question: Arrange the following numbers in descending order: [1289, 30987, 2504, 897, 67890]
hints: First, check how many digits each number has.
A five-digit number is the largest among smaller-digit numbers.
Among four-digit numbers, compare the left-most digits to determine order.
The number with the highest left-most digit comes first in descending order.
